name: SKS
description: Lightweight, semi-auto Carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm.  This hard hitting and agile Soviet rifle focuses on utility over accuracy.  It flaunts a faster fire rate than other weapons in its class, but a carefully placed round will eliminate the need for follow up shots entirely.  This classic DMR has seen a lot of battles, and its unique gunsmith configurations reflect a diverse service history.

attachments.name: 10 Round Mags
attachments.description: 10 round magazines of 7.62×39mm carry less ammunition, but increase mobility and speed up reload times.

attachments.name: 30 Round Mags
attachments.description: Extended magazines hold 30 rounds of 7.62×39mm ammunition with a slight weight increase.

attachments.name: 16" FSS Para
attachments.description: This compact barrel from FSS is a custom version of the classic SKS paratrooper barrel.  Better for sniping on the move.

attachments.name: 22" FSS M59/66
attachments.description: A modern take from FSS on the classic Yugoslavian sniper barrel.  22.0" barrel greatly increases muzzle velocity and extends range.

attachments.name: FTAC Landmark
attachments.description: Aluminum alloy shroud and chrome-moly polygonal rifled barrel perfectly balance range with mobility.

attachments.name: Tac Laser
attachments.description: High power 5mW tactical green laser.  Improves accuracy while aiming down sights.  Exposes position when active.

attachments.name: Compensator
attachments.description: Expels gases upward to aggressively fight muzzle climb.

attachments.name: Flash Guard
attachments.description: Suppress the flash of your weapon to help keep your target visible and your position concealed.  Slightly lowers muzzle velocity.

attachments.name: Muzzle Brake
attachments.description: Redirects gases outward to stabilize the weapon for better control of sustained fire.

attachments.name: Tactical Suppressor
attachments.description: Titanium can with stainless steel baffles.  Silences weapon with very little additional weight.

attachments.name: Integral Hybrid
attachments.description: 3.25x Scout with integral reflex sight for quickly transitioning between sights.

attachments.name: Reflex
attachments.description: Precision Reticle

attachments.name: Scout Combat Optic
attachments.description: Precision optic with 3.25x magnification for long range target acquisition.

attachments.name: Solozero NVG Enhanced
attachments.description: Advanced 3.25x Gen 3 night vision with thermal overlay for enhanced situational awareness. Not compatible with Night Vision Goggles.

attachments.name: Variable Zoom Scope
attachments.description: Advanced scope zooms between 3.5x and 8.0x for fighting at extended ranges. Optic glint visible to enemies.

attachments.name: FMJ
attachments.description: Increases bullet penetration and damage against equipment and killstreaks.

attachments.name: Fast Melee
attachments.description: Training in executing melee maneuvers with great speed.

attachments.name: Focus
attachments.description: Increased control of aim while being shot.

attachments.name: Frangible - Disabling
attachments.description: Bullets slow enemy movement and briefly disable tactical sprint when shooting legs.

attachments.name: Frangible - Wounding
attachments.description: Bullets cause target healing to be briefly delayed.

attachments.name: Fully Loaded
attachments.description: Start with Maximum Reserve Ammo.

attachments.name: Heavy Hitter
attachments.description: Melee produces greater stun on targets.

attachments.name: Mo' Money
attachments.description: Earn additional XP for kills.

attachments.name: Presence of Mind
attachments.description: Extended hold breath

attachments.name: Recon
attachments.description: See enemy nameplates at greater distances.

attachments.name: Sleight of Hand
attachments.description: Training in reloading faster when under pressure.

attachments.name: Rubberized Grip Tape
attachments.description: Rubberized grip keeps gun tight in hand.  Less steady, but helps control recoil.

attachments.name: FTAC Hunter-Scout
attachments.description: Western stock adaptor designed to improve aiming precision.

attachments.name: SKS Rifle Stock
attachments.description: Traditional rifle stock provides exceptional control while aiming, at the cost of mobility.

attachments.name: Bipod
attachments.description: Stability legs to improve control while using the weapon from the ground.

attachments.name: Commando Foregrip
attachments.description: Heavy weight angled grip keeps the weapon steady while aiming, and helps maintain control during heavy fire.

attachments.name: Merc Foregrip
attachments.description: Extended foregrip reduces vertical recoil and provides stability from the hip for fast-paced guerrilla tactics.

attachments.name: Operator Foregrip
attachments.description: No frills foregrip helps control vertical recoil for faster follow-up shots.

attachments.name: Tactical Foregrip
attachments.description: Streamlined foregrip provides superior control acquiring targets.
